prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Bass, Piano, Drums, Reed, Guitar, Brass, but without Chromatic Percussion.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Bass, Piano, Drums, Reed, Guitar, and Brass, but no Chromatic Percussion.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Bass, Piano, Drums, Reed, Guitar, and Brass, omitting Chromatic Percussion.

Style 3:
This composition consists of Bass, Piano, Drums, Reed, Guitar, and Brass, excluding Chromatic Percussion.
